column2: Although the people of Zakhara honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Although the people of Zakhara honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Hakiyah, goddess of honesty and truth.
Although the people of Zakhara honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Jisan, goddess of fertility and productivity.
Although the people of Zakhara honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Zann, god of knowledge and intellect.
